bibl.title: Notes and Corrections on Papyri of Euripides and Aristophanes (P. Oxy. LXVII 4557 and 4559; PSI VI 720).
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXVII, 4557 (= M.-P.3 388.4; LDAB 943): Euripides, Hecuba. - P. Oxy. LXVII, 4559 (= M.-P.3 389.1; LDAB 971): Euripides, Hecuba. - P.S.I. VI, 720 (= M.-P.3 150; LDAB 348): Aristophanes, Peace, 721-827.
BATTEZZATO Luigi, Notes and Corrections on Papyri of Euripides and Aristophanes (P. Oxy. LXVII 4557 and 4559; PSI VI 720).
